commentary.text: One slip
Steyn to Gayle,1 wide,good length, moving in, and slips down leg at 141 kph
Steyn to Gayle,1 run,good length again, turned off the pad to Ishant at fine leg
Steyn to PA Patel,no run,slants it across Parthiv at 138 kph, is left alone, it keeps climbing as it approaches the keeper
Steyn to PA Patel,2 runs,Parthiv comes across and tucks this length ball between midwicket and square leg, Dhawan and Sammy runs after it, Dhawan pulls it back and Sammy throws it in
Steyn to PA Patel,no run,beaten this time, pushed away from the body to a 144 kph length ball leaving him
Steyn to PA Patel,1 run,stays in the crease and pushes away from the body again, thick edge goes to third man
Steyn to Gayle,no run,back of a length, on the stumps, Gayle stays back and plays it out quietly to point
Kumar to PA Patel, $$OUT$$ ,Bhuvneshwar strikes first ball, he bowls it on a good length around off, it is swinging away a bit, Parthiv drives at it without much feet, and plays on
Kumar to Kohli,1 wide,floats it up wide and it swings further away outside off
Kumar to Kohli,no run,gets closer to off stump, and moves it away slightly from a length, is left alone
Kumar to Kohli,no run,angled in and straightens outside off, Kohli comes across and lets it go
Kumar to Kohli,no run,this comes in with the angle and makes him play just outside off, Kohli is forward to defend
Kumar to Kohli,no run,driven straight to cover

Kumar to Kohli, $$OUT$$ ,they have the big one, Bhuvneshwar ends a superb over on a high, this was much shorter than the length he had been bowling, it swung away, Kohli saw some width to cut, and nicked it through to the keeper
Steyn to Gayle,no run,Gayle cracks this length ball through the off side, Rahul flies to his right at extra cover to stop it, Rossouw is too far up the pitch, but the throw misses
Steyn to Gayle,no run,plays from the crease, this is a length ball hurrying on towards the stumps, he keeps it out, just in time
Steyn to Gayle, $$FOUR$$ ,this is a 147.6 kph length ball from Steyn, and it has come back faster at the bowler, goes screaming just past his right leg
Steyn to Gayle,no run,punches the length delivery to mid off
Steyn to Gayle,no run, $$chance$$  at mid on as Gayle mishits the pull off a sharp short ball, Dhawan dives forward but it falls just short
Steyn to Gayle, $$FOUR$$ ,he's swung hard at this length ball and sliced it high over the off-side infield, one bounce over the deep cover boundary
Kumar to Rossouw,no run,saw this moving across and shuffled to try the cut, but it started to swing in and beat him, was caught in a very awkward position there
Kumar to Rossouw,1 run,away to third man for a single
Kumar to Gayle,no run,starts outside leg on a length and moves across the left-hander who defends
Kumar to Gayle,1 run,tucked square off the pad, there is an easy two there as fine leg runs across, but Gayle is not turning back
Kumar to Rossouw,no run,Bhuvneshwar gets away this time, Rossouw tries to force this one outside leg very fine, but misses
Kumar to Rossouw,no run,length ball slanted across worked straight to square leg
I Sharma to Gayle,no run,pushes this hard into the pitch, it bounces over the bowler, mid on runs across, dives and parries it towards mid off
I Sharma to Gayle,no run,has a crack at this short ball going across outside off, toe-ends it to the keeper
I Sharma to Gayle,no run,cramps him for room with a length ball around off, Gayle tries to back away but his punch goes to mid off

I Sharma to Gayle, $$FOUR$$ ,slogs a length ball off the inner part of the bat through midwicket, Dhawan has little hope chasing it from midwicket, but Sammy is there in the deep, however, his dive is too early, and the ball slips past
I Sharma to Gayle, $$SIX$$ ,he connects alright now, a length ball on off, Gayle's front leg goes to the on side and the ball travels over the deep midwcket boundary
I Sharma to Gayle, $$SIX$$ ,another maximum, Ishant drops it short now, around chest height into the let-hander, and Gayle swivels to hook it over deep square leg
Arsh: "It seems kohli needs a blue jersey to perform like raina needs a yellow one!"
That ball has been lost. We have a replacement
Kumar to Rossouw,no run,moves forward and pushes this length ball wide of cover, who gets around to it and there is no single
Kumar to Rossouw, $$FOUR$$ ,Rossouw drills this length ball down the ground, takes it from well outside off and hits it past the bowler on the on side
Kumar to Rossouw,no run,a tad fuller and closer to off, angling across, Rossouw square-drives to point
Kumar to Rossouw,no run,moves to off stump and tries to square drive again, underedges it
Kumar to Rossouw,no run,pushed to mid off
round the wicket
Kumar to Rossouw,no run,angles it in to the left-hander just outside off, Rossouw has a drive at it and is beaten
Time out
Sanket: "I Sharma at his vintage best!"
Karn Sharma to bowl
KV Sharma to Gayle,no run,full around off stump, Gayle pushes it back
KV Sharma to Gayle,1 run,drags it shortish on the pad, Gayle only works it to deep midwicket
KV Sharma to Rossouw,1 run,quicker one on a length around off, he tries to pull it, hits it down to long on
KV Sharma to Gayle, $$OUT$$ ,the legspinner has struck big first over, Gayle has swung this flat and  pitched up delivery off his pad straight to Sammy at deep midwicket
KV Sharma to de Villiers,no run,now he tosses it up to the new batsman, AB follows it outside off, and is beaten
KV Sharma to de Villiers,no run,brilliantly bowled, flighted again, this time on the stumps, AB defends, leaves a gap between bat and pad, this does not turn, but an inside edge saves AB
I Sharma to Rossouw,1 run,now the running will be much quicker with AB in, Rossouw punches wide of cover and sets off, Warner fires it in, does not hit, Rossouw would have made it anyway
I Sharma to de Villiers,1 run,flays a full and wide delivery out to sweeper cover
I Sharma to Rossouw,no run,length ball pitches outside leg and hits the pad as he fails to work it square
I Sharma to Rossouw,1 run,good length ball slanted across a bit, he punches it nicely to sweeper cover
I Sharma to de Villiers,1 wide,tries the short ball but digs it too short and it rises way over the batsman
Hari Prasad: "Oh! Gayle gone, Rossouw might be relieved more than anyone else. Gayle was not running at all!"
I Sharma to de Villiers,1 run,a slower one, AB is early into the drive, he tries to adjust, but hits it in the air just wide of backward points dive
I Sharma to Rossouw,2 runs,into the pad, tucked through square leg for a very easy two runs
KV Sharma to de Villiers,1 run,skips out, yorks himself on this flighted one, inside edges it square on the leg side
KV Sharma to Rossouw,2 runs,moves across to this full delivery, turns it in front of square, they are going back for the second, Rossouw has to dive, and he does
KV Sharma to Rossouw,1 run,that has gone through Rahul at point, Rossouw moved across and punched it straight to the fielder
KV Sharma to de Villiers,1 run,turned off the pad to short fine leg
KV Sharma to Rossouw,no run,tries to paddle this full one from just outside off, cannot connect
KV Sharma to Rossouw,no run,tossed up on a length and hurries across with the angle at 90 kph, he tries to cut but is beaten
Pathan to de Villiers,1 run,angled across full outside off and swings in a bit, is smashed through extra cover to wide long off
Pathan to Rossouw,no run,full on the stumps, he pushes it straight past the bowler to mid off
Pathan to Rossouw,no run,charges out and has a swing, but is beaten as this back of a length ball moves away
Pathan to Rossouw,1 run,pitched up and straightening again, cannot time the drive, takes the single to mid off
Pathan to de Villiers,1 wide,floats it too wide outside off, AB tries to reach it, misses
Pathan to de Villiers,no run,was moving across trying to go over midwicket probably but this swung in to him and he did not have the room to have a go at it
Pathan to de Villiers, $$SIX$$ ,this time he has the width as Irfan goes full outside off, AB slogs him over long on, right into the waste bin lying in front of the Sunrisers dugout
KV Sharma to Rossouw, $$OUT$$ ,loud, long appeal for leg-before, Karn tosses it up full on the stumps, Rossouw tries the reverse sweep, misses and is struck right in front
Slip in for Yuvraj
KV Sharma to Yuvraj Singh,no run,presses forward to defend down the track
KV Sharma to Yuvraj Singh,1 run,comes down the track to work it down to long on
KV Sharma to de Villiers,no run,tossed up and bowled full into middle and leg, AB defends
KV Sharma to de Villiers,1 run,goes back as he sees the shorter length, but it comes in to the right-hander, he drags it in front of square
KV Sharma to Yuvraj Singh,no run,legbreak turned with the spin to square leg
I Sharma to de Villiers,1 run,full, slow and on the stumps, AB adjusts to drive to long on
I Sharma to Yuvraj Singh,no run,direct hit needed as Yuvraj turns this length ball to midwicket and AB charges up for the run which wasn't there, but Rahul misses
I Sharma to Yuvraj Singh, $$FOUR$$ ,this wasn't too short, but Yuvraj's reacted fast, he's crouched and whip-pulled it behind square leg
I Sharma to Yuvraj Singh,no run,Ishant responds with a proper short ball now, and pings Yuvraj smack on the back of the helmet as the batsman swivels and misses the hook
I Sharma to Yuvraj Singh,1 run,makes room outside leg and carves this length ball to sweeper cover
Nandakiran N: "This is the last recognised batting pair of the team. Void created by Albie's exclusion may prove costly here."
I Sharma to de Villiers, $$SIX$$ ,Ishant sends this full and just outside off, AB comes forward and launches it high and straight down the ground
Sammy to Yuvraj Singh,no run,very full around off, Yuvraj squeezes it out to point on the bounce
Sammy to Yuvraj Singh,no run,cranks up to try a big one but pushes the length delivery back to the bowler
Keeper standing up
Sammy to Yuvraj Singh,1 run,pushes another length delivery in front of extra cover and they take a sharp single, throw to the keeper was wide
Sammy to de Villiers, $$FOUR$$ ,Sammy goes full and wide, AB stretches and throws bat at it, thick edge flies past the keeper
Sammy to de Villiers,1 run,missed out this time, slogs a wide full toss toss to long on
Lokesh: "@Nandakiran-Albie had got too many chances!And with Gayle,AB,Kohli and Yuvraj in your batting order,what else do you need!!"
Sammy to Yuvraj Singh,no run,Yuvraj square-drives a full delivery crisply, but finds point in the way
Time out
DD: "@ Lokesh: how about one of them getting some runs?"
Pathan to de Villiers, $$SIX$$ ,full and wide from round the wicket, AB gets on the front foot, gets down on a knee and lofts it over extra cover
Pathan to de Villiers,no run,this full toss would have a wide had AB not moved across and tried to go leg side, hit it back to the bowler in the end
Pathan to de Villiers,2 runs, $$dropped$$ , tough chance at backward point, AB cuts, Karn Sharma jumps and stretches out his left hand, gets fingers to it but it does not stick
Pathan to de Villiers,1 run,full one driven to the sweeper
Pathan to Yuvraj Singh,no run,moving away outside off stump, Yuvraj is beaten as he tries to run it square
Pathan to Yuvraj Singh,1 run,taps this length ball on off to cover and keep strike
KV Sharma to Yuvraj Singh, $$SIX$$ ,Yuvraj comes down the track and lofts straight over the bowler, he actually got too close to the pitch but got front leg out of the way and swung it over
KV Sharma to Yuvraj Singh,no run,backs away, this one hurries towards the stumps, Yuvraj dabs it to cover, AB wants the single, he is half way up before being sent back

KV Sharma to Yuvraj Singh, $$OUT$$ ,Yuvraj is gone now, he's swept it to deep backward square leg, Henriques the substitute is there in the deep, he steadies himself at the edge of the rope and takes it over his head
KV Sharma to Starc,no run,straightens on the left hander from a length, defended off the front foot
KV Sharma to Starc,no run,thick inside edge to short fine leg as he swings at a full one
KV Sharma to Starc,2 runs,turned off the pad in front of square and even as deep midwicket runs in, they take the second comfortably
Sammy to de Villiers, $$SIX$$ ,full and wide, AB catapults it way over the long off boundary for a mammoth maximum
Sammy to de Villiers,1 run,fuller delivery, he goes after it again, scythes it down to long off
Sammy to Starc,1 run,drives to the sweeper, Henriques slips as he approaches the ball, but no harm done as he stops it and gets rid of it quickly
Sammy to de Villiers, $$FOUR$$ ,a full toss, AB clobbers it over the straight boundary, long off wasn't too far, he also had no chance

Sammy to de Villiers, $$SIX$$ ,Sammy tries a slower one at 107 kph, it sits up outside off, and AB pummels it over deep midwicket, not a clean hit but RCB don't care as long as it goes over, it is also fifty for AB off 23 balls
Sammy to de Villiers,1 run,leading edge to end the over with a single to the sweeper
Steyn is back
Pulkit: "The over from Sammy will be a game changer....!! Bit of a gamble by Dhawan...."
Steyn to de Villiers,1 run,there was a chance for a run out, but Sammy cannot pick up the ball at mid off after AB drills a full delivery straight to him
Steyn to Starc,1 run,slower ball on a length, Starc pushes it to sweeper cover to bring AB back on strike
Fine leg brought in
Steyn to de Villiers,no run,bouncer, moving away outside off, AB watches it and pulls away in the end
Steyn to de Villiers,no run,sees AB walk across outside off stump and hurls it wide, clearly past the marker, but Dharmasena says AB had moved too far
Steyn to de Villiers,1 run,full and wide again, AB cannot get under it and flays it down to long off
Steyn to Starc,no run,almost chops this full delivery on, AB thinks about sneaking in a single initially, Starc hesitates as bowler and keeper charge in, AB backs off in the end
Bhuvneshwar to bowl out
Kumar to de Villiers, $$FOUR$$ ,he starts full and wide as well, AB throws his bat at it, slices it high over backward point
Kumar to de Villiers,no run,wide yorker, AB tries to reach it, cannot connect as it  moves away
Kumar to de Villiers,no run,another dot, Bhuvneshwar goes full and wide again, well inside the marker, AB lets it be
Kumar to de Villiers,no run,terrific stuff from Bhuvneshwar, this is a yorker closer to off now, AB is beaten once more
Kumar to de Villiers, $$FOUR$$ ,AB improvises, Bhuvneshwar sticks to full and wide outside off, but AB stretches forward and reverse-paddles it past short third man

Kumar to de Villiers,1 run,he tries the reverse-paddle again, hits it to Irfan at short third man, keeps the strike, Irfan resists the urge to have a go at the stumps with Bhuvneshwar nowhere near the stumps
Steyn to de Villiers, $$SIX$$ ,Steyn goes for six first ball, a slow offcutter on a good length, AB picks it over deep square leg
Steyn to de Villiers, $$SIX$$ ,into the sightscreen now, full delivery, AB walks to off, moves forward and lofts it over Steyn
Chat between Sammy and Steyn
Steyn to de Villiers,1 leg bye,this could have gone too, a full toss on the pad, AB misses, Steyn screams for lbw, it was headed down leg though
Steyn to Starc,1 run,Starc flays at this pitched up delivery, inside edges it to midwicket, turns the strike over, which is he needs to do
Steyn to de Villiers, $$FOUR$$ ,mid off is up, Steyn goes full just outside off, AB goes back and across and lofts him calmly to the wide long off boundary
Steyn to de Villiers, $$SIX$$ ,he's taken Steyn apart once more, walks across way outside off, gets down and scoops him into the third tier over the fine leg boundary, what a man... Dale Steyn claps
Pathan to Starc, $$OUT$$ ,Starc forces the length ball to mid off, but is found well short on the direct hit
Pathan to de Villiers,1 run,AB moves wide outside off stump to try the scoop again, cannot get hold of it, the ball rolls square on the off side
Pathan to HV Patel,no run,a slower one, Harshal has a swing and a miss, tries to take a bye, falls onto the pitch, but just stretches his bat in
Pathan to HV Patel,1 run,has another swing, inside edges the full delivery to square leg, AB is back on strike
Pathan to de Villiers, $$FOUR$$ ,AB does it with a ball to spare, it is a low full toss, he smashes it in the gap to the deep midwicket boundary
That is all for tonight. Good bye

AB de Villiers is the Man of the Match. AB: "It is one of those nights where things go your way. I had a Skype session with my mom and dad today, and my dad said, the others are lucky. Guess I had my luck today. He (Steyn) won the first set and I won the second. I would have loved to have a third set against him. In those kinds of situations it is the small things that matter the most. It is team spirit, such things that matter in the end. Yuvraj kept boosting me up tonight, got to give credit to him."
Pommie Mbangwa doing the presentation tells AB that Dale Steyn said "different class" as he walked past the commentator after the end of the match.

Kohli: "He (AB) is the best player in the world by far. He has shown it every now and then, and he has shown it again today why he is rated the number one in the world in any format. Today was one of the days we needed someone to win the game from that tough situation. One of the best innings in T20 I have seen, the way he was striking the ball under pressure. We thought it was a below-par score in Bangalore. Generally you get 170. Chris got us to a decent start, the way AB played, he took it away from the opposition."

Dhawan: "You cannot help it when someone produces a great knock. Unfortunately we missed the half chance AB offered at point and he took it away after that. We felt we were 10-15 runs short. We started off well as a bowling unit but AB played amazingly. Karn Sharma bowled well, he got their two main left-handers out."
Steyn congratulates his South Africa captain with a hug and a pat on the helmet. He had done the same in 2012 after  $$this$$ $$match$$  as well, when AB took him for 23 in an over

Eight sixes, unbeaten 89 with the next-highest being 27. Last two overs, 28 needed, world's best fast bowler running in, and he settles matters in the penultimate over itself. Absolutely Brilliant from AB, once again.
Vikram: "Steyn is to De Villiers as Federer is to Nadal "
Suneel: "Bad over Steyn. Not a single yorker from the best bowler in the world. No excuse even if it is De Villiers or any other batsman"

name: Royal Challengers Bangalore v Sunrisers Hyderabad
